prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with sleek, serpentine features and vivid blue scales.
I want a Pokemon that combines aquatic elegance with electric power, showcasing vibrant colors.
Generate an image of a Pokemon resembling an eel, with multiple tentacle-like appendages.
Make a fierce-looking Pokemon that can swim, electrify foes, and has striking red accents.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique body shape that perfectly blends water and electricity.
Design a powerful electric-type Pokemon that features expressive eyes and a flowing body.
Show me an unusual Pokemon design that embodies both agility in water and strength in battle.
